languages.text: "Господин Таддуа не знает пощады, а рука его неизменно тверда в священном деле отправления правосудия..." {n}Мейв старательно держит осанку, однако ее испуганный взгляд намеренно устремлен прочь и от палача, и от железного механизма за его спиной.{/n}

"Master Taddua knows no mercy, and his hand is unfailingly firm in the sacred cause of administering justice..." {n}Maive is careful to keep her posture straight, but her frightened gaze is deliberately averted from both the executioner and the mechanism behind him.{/n}

"Master Ursus knows no mercy, and his hand is unfailingly firm in the sacred cause of administering justice..." {n}Maive is careful to keep her posture straight, but her frightened gaze is deliberately averted from both the executioner and the iron statue behind him.{/n}

languages.text: “塔杜亚大师对恶人没有任何怜悯。他的双手始终坚定不移，毫不留情地伸张神圣的正义……”{n}梅芙小心翼翼地保持着挺直的仪态，但她惊恐的目光却有意避开了刽子手与他身后的刑具。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Taddua knows no mercy, and his hand is unfailingly firm in the sacred cause of administering justice..." {n}Maive is careful to keep her posture straight, but her frightened gaze is deliberately averted from both the executioner and the mechanism behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “塔杜亚大师对恶人没有任何怜悯。他的双手始终坚定不移，毫不留情地伸张神圣的正义……”{n}梅芙小心翼翼地保持着挺直的仪态，但她惊恐的目光却有意避开了刽子手与他身后的刑具。{/n}
“乌苏斯大师对恶人没有任何怜悯。他的双手始终坚定不移，毫不留情地伸张神圣的正义……”{n}梅芙小心翼翼地保持着挺直的仪态，但她惊恐的目光却有意避开了刽子手与他身后的刑具。{/n}

languages.text: «Maese Taddua no conoce la piedad, y su mano se mantiene siempre firme en su sagrado deber de impartir justicia...». {n}Maive procura mantenerse derecha, pero el miedo le impide mirar directamente al verdugo y al mecanismo que hay detrás de él.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Taddua knows no mercy, and his hand is unfailingly firm in the sacred cause of administering justice..." {n}Maive is careful to keep her posture straight, but her frightened gaze is deliberately averted from both the executioner and the mechanism behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Maese Taddua no conoce la piedad, y su mano se mantiene siempre firme en su sagrado deber de impartir justicia...». {n}Maive procura mantenerse derecha, pero el miedo le impide mirar directamente al verdugo y al mecanismo que hay detrás de él.{/n}

«Maese Ursus no conoce la piedad, y su mano se mantiene siempre firme en su sagrado deber de impartir justicia...». {n}Maive procura mantenerse derecha, pero el miedo le impide mirar directamente al verdugo y al mecanismo que hay detrás de él.{/n}

languages.text: "Efendi Taddua, merhamet nedir bilmez ve adaleti yerine getirmeye yönelik kutsal davasında eli asla titremez..." {n}Maive duruşunu dik tutmaya özen gösterse de korkmuş bakışları, kasten hem cellattan hem de arkasındaki mekanizmadan kaçınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Taddua knows no mercy, and his hand is unfailingly firm in the sacred cause of administering justice..." {n}Maive is careful to keep her posture straight, but her frightened gaze is deliberately averted from both the executioner and the mechanism behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Efendi Taddua, merhamet nedir bilmez ve adaleti yerine getirmeye yönelik kutsal davasında eli asla titremez..." {n}Maive duruşunu dik tutmaya özen gösterse de korkmuş bakışları, kasten hem cellattan hem de arkasındaki mekanizmadan kaçınıyor.{/n}

"Efendi Ursus, merhamet nedir bilmez ve adaleti yerine getirmeye yönelik kutsal davasında eli asla titremez..." {n}Maive duruşunu dik tutmaya özen gösterse de korkmuş bakışları, kasten hem cellattan hem de arkasındaki mekanizmadan kaçınıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「マスター・タッドゥアは情け知らずで、彼の手は正義執行の聖なる大義において常に固く握られています…」{n}メイヴは注意深く背筋を伸ばしているが、彼女の恐怖に怯えた視線は、処刑人と彼の後ろにある機械から意図的にそらされている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Taddua knows no mercy, and his hand is unfailingly firm in the sacred cause of administering justice..." {n}Maive is careful to keep her posture straight, but her frightened gaze is deliberately averted from both the executioner and the mechanism behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・アーサスは情け知らずで、彼の手は正義執行の聖なる大義において常に固く握られています…」{n}メイヴは注意深く背筋を伸ばしているが、彼女の恐怖に怯えた視線は、処刑人と彼の後ろにある像から意図的にそらされている。{/n}
「マスター・アーサスは情け知らずで、彼の手は正義執行の聖なる大義において常に固く握られています…」{n}メイヴは注意深く背筋を伸ばしているが、彼女の恐怖に怯えた視線は、処刑人と彼の後ろにある機械から意図的にそらされている。{/n}

languages.text: « Maître Taddua ne connaît pas la pitié, et sa main reste inébranlable dans sa mission sacrée d'exécuteur de la justice... » {n}Maive s'efforce de garder la tête haute, mais son regard effrayé se détourne délibérément du bourreau et du mécanisme derrière lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Taddua knows no mercy, and his hand is unfailingly firm in the sacred cause of administering justice..." {n}Maive is careful to keep her posture straight, but her frightened gaze is deliberately averted from both the executioner and the mechanism behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Maître Taddua ne connaît pas la pitié, et sa main reste inébranlable dans sa mission sacrée d'exécuteur de la justice... » {n}Maive s'efforce de garder la tête haute, mais son regard effrayé se détourne délibérément du bourreau et du mécanisme derrière lui.{/n}

« Maître Ursus ne connaît pas la pitié, et sa main reste inébranlable dans sa mission sacrée d'exécuteur de la justice... » {n}Maive s'efforce de garder la tête haute, mais son regard effrayé se détourne délibérément du bourreau et du mécanisme derrière lui.{/n}

languages.text: "Meister Taddua kennt keine Gnade, und seine Hand erfüllt ohne Fehl die heilige Pflicht, der Gerechtigkeit genüge zu tun ..." {n}Maive bewahrt Haltung, wendet den verängstigten Blick aber bewusst von dem Henker und dem Mechanismus hinter ihm ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Taddua knows no mercy, and his hand is unfailingly firm in the sacred cause of administering justice..." {n}Maive is careful to keep her posture straight, but her frightened gaze is deliberately averted from both the executioner and the mechanism behind him.{/n}

"Meister Ursus kennt keine Gnade, und seine Hand erfüllt ohne Fehl die heilige Pflicht, der Gerechtigkeit genüge zu tun ..." {n}Maive bewahrt Haltung, wendet den verängstigten Blick aber bewusst von dem Henker und der Statue hinter ihm ab.{/n}
